resources.singularity: required, can be installed or loaded via module
resources.container: required, built after each update, e.g. singularity pull docker://hcibioinformatics/public:GATK_SM_2
input_files: germline variant xxx.vcf.gz file with its associated index
gender and capture matched PoN xxx.hdf5 and xxx.interval_list files
resources.resource_archive: required for AWS EC2 via JobRunner, containing: Homo_sapiens_assembly38.fasta, Homo_sapiens_assembly38.dict, Homo_sapiens_assembly38.fasta.fai, public_GATK_SM_1.sif, mergedSeqCap_EZ_Exome_v3_hg38_capture_primary_targets_pad150bp.preprocessed.interval_list, hg38IdtProbesPad150bp.processed.interval_list, hg38StdChromLengths.bed.gz, hg38RefSeq8Aug2018_Merged.ucsc.gz
